title: What is your favourite album and why? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Dream Chapter Star- TXT: I like this album a lot, since I started following TXT before the debut, I expected a lot from the album. And I wasn’t disappointed every song on it is a bop.Most people don’t like their concept, or a song from it. But I love it, I thik the concept fits them for the time being. My favorite song(s) Cat and Dog, Crown. Our Summer.Crybaby and Dollhouse- Melanie Martinez: yes, I know she’s been through some past controversy but I still love these albums. I can’t choose a favorite song though.Blurryface, Vessel, and Regional at Best- Twenty One Pilots. I love these boys! These are some of my favorite albums from them, because some of my favorite songs are on it.

At the moment? I like Confident (Demi Lovato). Firstly, Demi has managed to worm her way to pretty much 1st place of ‘Imogen’s Favourite Singers’, so I tend to enjoy a lot of her music. However, that doesn’t mean that I like every single song she makes, which is what makes Confident special. It’s literally the only album I own where there are no songs I dislike. I do have preferences when it comes to the songs. I can tolerate the two remixes and Father isn’t that bad, but given the choice I have songs which I rank above others.
